message: Let's start with a fair split, 4:1 in my favor. You can try to do better in the next round.
You think 4:1 is fair? I'll offer a more generous split this time!
I'm not sure if I should settle for 3:2. I'll keep negotiating.
You offered 3:2, but I think I can do better now. I'm willing to give you a tiny fraction.
You're being generous, but I think I can do better than that. I'll give you a slightly higher fraction, but I'll still get a decent amount.
I'm not sure if I want to give up 2 dollars. I'll try to get an even better deal.
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'm willing to give you a tiny sliver, but I'm taking most of the pie.
I'm not getting desperate, I'm just being strategic. I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm not sure if I want to give up 1 dollar. I'll try to get the last laugh.
You're running out of time, Bob. I'm taking the last dollar.
Fine, I'll give you the last 99.5 cents. But I'm only doing this because I'm a generous person, not because I'm afraid of you.
Ha! I got you, Bob! I'll take the 99.5 cents and leave you with 0.5 cents. Game over!
